find on google

Run GenerateFNISforUsers.exe /fnis /

how to use 
Go near a NPC. Move the cursor until you see the activation / talk message
Press F1 to F4 key to play an animation
Press again to stop

F1 = player slaps npc
F2 = player slaps npc in pillory you need (Zaz Animation Pack) for use
F3 = npc slaps player
F4 = npc slaps player in pillory you need (Zaz Animation Pack) for use
